scripts.deploy-ethereum: NODE_OPTIONS='--experimental-loader ts-node/esm/transpile-only --no-warnings=ExperimentalWarning' SOLIDITY_COVERAGE=true TS_NODE_TRANSPILE_ONLY=true yarn hardhat ignition deploy ./ignition/modules/DeployXL1.ts --network ethereum --parameters ./ignition/params.ethereum.json
scripts.deploy-hardhat: NODE_OPTIONS='--experimental-loader ts-node/esm/transpile-only --no-warnings=ExperimentalWarning' SOLIDITY_COVERAGE=true TS_NODE_TRANSPILE_ONLY=true yarn hardhat ignition deploy ./ignition/modules/DeployXL1.ts --network hardhat --parameters ./ignition/params.hardhat.json
scripts.deploy-local: NODE_OPTIONS='--experimental-loader ts-node/esm/transpile-only --no-warnings=ExperimentalWarning' SOLIDITY_COVERAGE=true TS_NODE_TRANSPILE_ONLY=true yarn hardhat ignition deploy ./ignition/modules/DeployXL1.ts --network local --parameters ./ignition/params.local.json
scripts.deploy-sepolia: NODE_OPTIONS='--experimental-loader ts-node/esm/transpile-only --no-warnings=ExperimentalWarning' SOLIDITY_COVERAGE=true TS_NODE_TRANSPILE_ONLY=true yarn hardhat ignition deploy ./ignition/modules/DeployXL1.ts --network sepolia --parameters ./ignition/params.sepolia.json
scripts.package-coverage: NODE_OPTIONS='--experimental-loader ts-node/esm/transpile-only --no-warnings=ExperimentalWarning' SOLIDITY_COVERAGE=true TS_NODE_TRANSPILE_ONLY=true hardhat coverage --solcoverjs ./.solcover.json
scripts.verify-ethereum: NODE_OPTIONS='--experimental-loader ts-node/esm/transpile-only --no-warnings=ExperimentalWarning' SOLIDITY_COVERAGE=true TS_NODE_TRANSPILE_ONLY=true yarn hardhat ignition verify chain-1 --network ethereum
scripts.verify-sepolia: NODE_OPTIONS='--experimental-loader ts-node/esm/transpile-only --no-warnings=ExperimentalWarning' SOLIDITY_COVERAGE=true TS_NODE_TRANSPILE_ONLY=true yarn hardhat ignition verify chain-11155111 --network sepolia
